title: Who invented the cell phone charger cable? - Quora

response.answer_text: Which cell phone charger cable? I have various old Motorola and Nokia cell phones that all use different cables. And that’s the basic problem, right? If you are asking ‘who’ invented the micro-USB cable, which was mandated in Europe to be the single common charging cable, that would generally be the USB standards body About USB-IF | USB-IF which is a non-profit industry association which has a consortium of manufacturers on its board. They are charged with establishing the standards for USB so that devices will work together worldwide.
